# Executive Summary 

This study aimed at constructing a Random Forest model for AirBnb pricing prediction using a bymber of factors related to rental data. The work is divided into an introduction, where the problem and the study aims are described. Methods in section 2 describes the data and the RF model and any data pre-processing. In section 3 and 4, the tuning and results are addressed and a critical evaluation of the model carried out, respectively.
